title: „Wettervorhersage“ von MSI: Lightning-Grafikkartenserie kehrt zurück
description: MSI hat heimlich einen Teaser für die Rückkehr seiner Flaggschiff-Grafikkartenserie Lightning auf Social Media platziert. Eine Wettervorhersage warnt vor Gewitter am 5. Januar – womit nur der Beginn der CES 2026 gemeint sein kann.

Eine Wettervorhersage warnt vor Gewitter am 5. Januar – womit nur der Beginn der CES 2026 gemeint sein kann.
en: “Weathercast” from MSI: Lightning graphics card series returns. MSI has secretly posted a teaser for the return of its flagship Lightning graphics card series on social media. A weather forecast warns of thunderstorms on January 5th - which can only mean the start of CES 2026.
la: "Tempestas" ex MSI: Fulguratio graphics card series redit. MSI latenter teorem misit pro reditu eius praetoriae Fulgurae in instrumentis socialibus ad seriem chartarum graphicarum. Praedictio tempestatis admonet tonitribus die 5 mensis Ianuarii - quae initium CES MMXXVI non potest significare.

en: The “crime scene” in a quick check: The slightly different Sunday fairy tale. Snow is falling in the Black Forest, Friedemann Berg is clearing out and Franziska Tobler is supposed to solve a murder. Or is there even two? Once upon a time there was a crime thriller: “The Youngest Little Goat” haunts the undergrowth of its enchanted plot.
la: "Scelus scaena" in celeri perscriptio: Dominica paulo aliter mediocris fabula. Nix in Silva Nigra incidit, Friedemann Berg se purgat et Franziska Tobler homicidium solvere putatur. An etiam duo sunt? Olim crimen erat thriller: "Parvus Minimus Capra" virgulta tenet incantatae insidiae.
